net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations

Annotation Type PluginImplementation


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface PluginImplementation
    This annotation can be used to mark plugin instances which should be initialized at runtime. If you don't annotate your plugin with this annotation, nothing will happen. For example, to specify that a specific class should be treated as a plugin you would write:

    @PluginImplementation
    public class ServiceImpl implements Service { ... }

    In this case, Service has to extend Plugin.
    Author:
    Ralf Biedert
